name: HARVEST (itch) (Man in a TAN jacket)
description:
Play as an unfortunate farmer who’s indebted to the cult of the Earth goddess Tlaltecuhtli, who demand a quick and plentiful harvest. Make sure to move quick to keep your farm happy!
Movement is with the arrow keys. Z is attack
X is dash/plant seeds.

Theo Nikolaitchik (Programmer)
Alex Busch (Programmer)
Logan Baker (Art)
